channel.title: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers
channel.description: How come my other Admin Doesnt Have Powers and I do? Yes I did change every that I think need changing this is what I changed under [code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin[/code]. Yes I did search but my results came up blank.

item.title: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers
item.dc:creator: @omgimjack omgimjack
item.description:
@omgimjack wrote:

Create commands for admins instead of owner only

Read full topic
item.source: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers

item.title: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

I had that same problem. Try these steps first of all.

  1. Restart MoparScape
  2. Shut down your server and compile and run again.
  3. Redo your playerRights section with the admin etc
  4. Post asking for help.

For me the first 2 worked.

Read full topic
item.source: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers

item.title: Admin and Mods Withough Their Pwoers
item.dc:creator: @Hadoku Hadoku
item.description:
@Hadoku wrote:

This is what you should see when you search that… under it…

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ADMIN NAME GOES HERE”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Change the admin name to your name and then there should be a lot more under it, just add names. You should have powers. Although when you’re level 3 you cant see your crown but others can.

Read full topic
